00035 #include "SimpleMono.h"
00036 
00037 class WaveTrack;
00038 
00039 class EffectPhaser:public EffectSimpleMono {
00040 
00041  public:
00042    EffectPhaser();
00043 
00044    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00045       return wxString(_("Phaser..."));
00046    }
00047    
00048    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00049       std::set<wxString> result;
00050       result.insert(wxT("http://lv2plug.in/ns/lv2core#PhaserPlugin"));
00051       return result;
00052    }
00053 
00054    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00055       return wxString(wxT("Phaser"));
00056    }
00057 
00058    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00059       return wxString(_("Applying Phaser"));
00060    }
00061    
00062    // Useful only after PromptUser values have been set. 
00063    virtual wxString GetEffectDescription(); 
00064 
00065    virtual bool PromptUser();
00066    virtual bool TransferParameters( Shuttle & shuttle );
00067 
00068  protected:
00069    virtual bool NewTrackSimpleMono();
00070 
00071    virtual bool ProcessSimpleMono(float *buffer, sampleCount len);
00072    
00073 /*
00074     Phaser Parameters        
00075 
00076  freq       - Phaser's LFO frequency
00077  startphase - Phaser's LFO startphase (radians), needed for stereo Phasers
00078  depth      - Phaser depth (0 - no depth, 255 - max depth)
00079  stages     - Phaser stages (recomanded from 2 to 16-24, and EVEN NUMBER)
00080  drywet     - Dry/wet mix, (0 - dry, 128 - dry=wet, 255 - wet)
00081  fb         - Phaser FeedBack (0 - no feedback, 100 = 100% Feedback,
00082                                -100 = -100% FeedBack)
00083 */
00084 
00085  private:
00086  
00087    // parameters
00088    float freq;
00089    float startphase;
00090    float fb;
00091    int depth;
00092    int stages;
00093    int drywet;
00094 
00095    // state variables
00096    unsigned long skipcount;
00097    float old[24]; // must be as large as MAX_STAGES
00098    float gain;
00099    float fbout;
00100    float lfoskip;
00101    float phase;
00102 
00103 friend class PhaserDialog;
00104 };
